text: 22.5 A new civic centre and a new green spine to the south of Whitechapel Road will provide focal points for leisure and community/ social activities. The public realm in and around the Tower of London world heritage site will be enhanced, with improved legibility and movement for all users. 22.6 A masterplan will be developed for the Brick Lane area, which will set out a tailored vision, strategic priorities, and detailed design guidance for the development of sites within the Brick Lane area. This will be reflected in the site allocation for Brick Lane and Pedley Street. Objectives a. Create a new civic centre and world-class life science research hub at Whitechapel b.
